xldoc.title: History of Philosophical Logic - Part I
xldoc.description: A history of logic and of the concept of logical truth
xldoc.keywords: rbjones philosophy analytic semantics meaning necessity logic metaphysics

section.title: Overview
section.abstract: First part of a history of Philosophical Logic reaching Russell's Logical Atomism and Wittgenstein's Tractatus via Aristotle, Leibniz, Hume, Kant and Frege.

secref.title: Introduction
secref.abstract: This presents an informal view of the project consisting of a selective history of philosophical logic and related areas making use of a method for formal logical analysis and providing the historical background underpinning and leading to that method.
